original_text: But the Lord said to Jonah, ‘You are upset about what happened to this little plant. But you did not plant it. You did not help it to grow. It grew up quickly during one night and by the next night it had died. You are sorry about such a little thing!
korean_text: 여호와께서 이르시되 네가 수고도 아니하였고 재배도 아니하였고 하룻밤에 났다가 하룻밤에 말라 버린 이 박넝쿨을 아꼈거든

sentences.original_text: But the Lord said to Jonah
You are upset about what happened to this little plant
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이 작은 식물에게 일어난 일에 대해 화가 났다

sentences.original_text: But you did not plant it
You did not help it to grow
It grew up quickly during one night
and by the next night it had died
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 다음 날 밤까지 죽었다

sentences.original_text: You are sorry about such a little thing
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그렇게 작은 일에 대해 미안해하고 있다
